column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our server was great
column2: though the pizza did take much longer than we thought since we placed the order so early. The classic was tasty
column3: this was my favorite deep dish of the trip. It's not as deep and the crust is thin and crunchy. For 2 people
column4: it was not overly heavy at all
column5: and the perfect size for us.
